subtopics.name: Frequency
subtopics.description: How often you and your partner communicate
subtopics.questions: Before talking to your partner, think about what's been on your mind. Do you feel like you're talking too much? Not enough? Do you have ideas on how to make things better?
subtopics.starter: Hey, I've been thinking about how often we talk lately. Could we talk about that when you have time?
ideas: I feel like we've been spending a lot of time around each other, but not really talking much. Do you feel the same? Would you want to plan a date night were we turn off our phones and just spend some time really catching up?

I love talking with you at night about how our days went, but I've been staying up way too late texting and feeling really tired all day. I think I need to start putting my phone away by 10 at the latest.

subtopics.name: Conflict Resolution
subtopics.questions: Before talking to your partner, think about what's been on your mind. Do you get into yelling matches? Is one of you using the silent treatment or avoidance? Do you have ideas on how to make things better?
subtopics.starter: Could we talk about the arguments we've been having lately? I have some things I want to talk through with you.
ideas: I've been feeling really upset about our arguments lately. It seems like they've been getting really heated and turning into yelling matches. If we feel a conflict coming on, can we try to take a break to cool off before talking it through?

I feel like you've been really distant since we got into that argument, but you keep saying everything is fine. I've been upset too, and I think it would really help if we both tried to be honest about how we're feeling instead of bottling it up.

subtopics.name: Monogamy
subtopics.description: Whether either of you can date or hook up with other people

subtopics.name: Length
subtopics.description: How long you envision this lasting

subtopics.name: Purpose
subtopics.description: What you're both looking for-- dating, someone to live with, hook ups, or something else
